definitions.definition: A bus ( vehicle for transporting large numbers of people along roads ) .
An anthology of previously released material linked together by theme or author, especially in book form.
A broadcast programme consisting of all of the episodes of a serial that have been shown in the previous week.
examples: The omnibus edition of The Archers is broadcast every Sunday morning at 11.00.

definitions.definition: A stamp issue , usually commemorative , that appears simultaneously in several countries as a joint issue .

main_definition: ( dated ) A bus ( vehicle for transporting large numbers of people along roads ) .
secondary_definitions: An anthology of previously released material linked together by theme or author, especially in book form.
A broadcast programme consisting of all of the episodes of a serial that have been shown in the previous week.
( philately ) A stamp issue , usually commemorative , that appears simultaneously in several countries as a joint issue .
( obsolete , slang , chiefly US ) An assistant waiter .
